name: HomeBloodGlucoseMonitorDevice
title: Home Blood Glucose Monitor Device
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Blood glucose monitoring devices and receiver dedicated for continuous monitoring, that may be used in the home.),(Data Element Scope: Blood glucose monitoring devices and receiver dedicated for continuous monitoring, that may be used in the home, as defined by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid.),(Inclusion Criteria: Blood glucose monitoring devices and receiver dedicated for continuous monitoring, that may be used in the home.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
